summary: Bruce Cabot  was an American movie actor.
full_text: Bruce Cabot  was an American film actor, best remembered as Jack Driscoll in King Kong  and for his roles in films such as the 1936 version of Last of the Mohicans, Fritz Lang's Fury and the western Dodge City. He was also known as one of "Wayne's Regulars", appearing in a number of John Wayne films beginning with Angel and the Badman.
title: Bruce Cabot
